## Question 1

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
pols_month_df = read_csv(file = "./fivethirtyeight_datasets/pols-month.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names(pols_month_df) |>
  pols_month_df <- pols_month_df %>%
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-")

```
